citations.narrative:
Primary enclosures are not being cleaned and sanitized as necessary. An enclosure housing a female adult dog named
Sweetie and her four puppies, had a moderate buildup of grime extending through the lower portion of all four walls.
Located on the back wall near each corner were two fly sticky traps. Directly near them on the wall and within the wall
crevices were accumulations of grime and fly strike. The rest of the dog kennel had minor to moderate amounts of fly
strike primarily on the outer surfaces of their primary enclosures.
Hard surfaces with which the dogs or cats come in contact must be spot-cleaned daily and sanitized in accordance with §
3.11(b) of this subpart to prevent accumulation of excreta and reduce disease hazards.
Correct by October 16, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3)  Repeat
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Primary enclosures are not being cleaned and sanitized as necessary. An enclosure housing a female adult dog named 
Sweetie and her four puppies, had a moderate buildup of grime extending through the lower portion of all four walls. 
Located on the back wall near each corner were two fly sticky traps. Directly near them on the wall and within the wall 
crevices were accumulations of grime and fly strike. The rest of the dog kennel had minor to moderate amounts of fly 
strike primarily on the outer surfaces of their primary enclosures. 
 
Hard surfaces with which the dogs or cats come in contact must be spot-cleaned daily and sanitized in accordance with § 
3.11(b) of this subpart to prevent accumulation of excreta and reduce disease hazards. 
 
Correct by October 16, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
